text: James Michael Tyler (May 28, 1961- October 24, 2021) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Gunther in the sitcom series Friends. Tyler was born in Greenwood, Mississippi and was raised in Winona, Mississippi. ==Personal life== In June 2021, Tyler said he was diagnosed with stage-4 prostate cancer back in 2018. He died from the disease at his Los Angeles, California home on October 24, 2021 at the age of 59. ==Filmography== * The Disturbance at Dinner (1998) * Foreign Correspondents (1999) * Motel Blue (1999) * Live With It (2008) * Jason's Big Problem (2010) ==Television== * Friends (1994 - 2004) * Just Shoot Me! (2000) * Sabrina, the Teenage Witch (2001) * Scrubs (2005) * Iron Chef America * ICarly (2011) * Episodes ==Music videos== * Come Tomorrow ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:People from Winona, Mississippi Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: James Michael Tyler
